trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará los eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted" /> y <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control con un objeto comercial y un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control para eliminar datos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> inicialmente muestra un conjunto de todos los empleados, utilizando el método especificado por la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propiedad para recuperar los datos de la `EmployeeLogic` objeto.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Dado que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> propiedad está establecida en `true`, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> automáticamente control muestra un **eliminar** botón.

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Si hace clic en el **eliminar** botón, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> acción se realiza utilizando el método especificado por la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> propiedad y los parámetros que se especifican en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> colección.

trans-unit.source: In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed.
trans-unit.target: En este ejemplo de código, también se realizan algunos pasos de preprocesamiento y posteriores al procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> action has completed, to perform exception handling.
trans-unit.target: El `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegado se llama para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> evento antes de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> se realiza la acción y el `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegado se llama para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> evento después de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> acción haya finalizado, para llevar a cabo control de excepciones.

trans-unit.source: In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate.
trans-unit.target: En este ejemplo, si un `NorthwindDataException` es produce, se controla por este delegado.

trans-unit.source: To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para examinar la implementación de la `EmployeeLogic` objeto comercial de nivel medio que se usa en este ejemplo de código, vea la información general de la clase en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>.
